title: I Just Do!
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Fufu, does it taste good? Eat a lot, okay~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Kayochiiin! Kayochiiin! There you are~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Huh, Rin-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ehehe, Eli-chan asked me to get you since the club is about to start nya.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eh....? I-, is it time already!? I’m sorry! Did it take long to find me....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Nope! Rin found you in an instant. Rin thought, “Since it’s Kayochin, she’s probably taking care of the alpacas~”.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>How do you know me that well, Rin-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eeeh~, Rin doesn’t know. But you know exactly what Rin is thinking a lot of the time too, right, Kayochin? How do you do that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I-, I also don’t know.... I just kind of do....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Then Rin is the same! Rin somehow knows what you’re thinking, Kayochin!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
